lol all the moralfags in these comments make me laugh. Yeah, singerman was deceitful and scummy and was never up front about what he wanted, which was fun quickie lays with little girls. But the reality is that every single one of those hormonal tweens wanted the dick, and got the dick, because it turns out that 12-14 year girls actually get horny and would agree to fuck attractive guys who expressed interest in them. 

The idea of "poor deceived innocent girls" we use in these situations has never had more than a tenuous connection with reality, and that's not to say we should just declare open season on the JCs of the world, but we also know that there are a lot of young girls like the ones in this work who really do want to get laid, just like you did when you were 12, and guys like singerman exploit the fact that we have to pretend teen girls are delicate little flowers.

He was absolutely right about one thing - they all wanted to get "manipulated" deep down.
